Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj

loans.use: Purchasing seed, fertilizer, fuels and lubricants and cattle

loans.name: Rifaat

texts.ar:
رفعت في عمر 38 سنة يعمل في اشتراكات المولدات الكهربائية له في عمله اربع سنوات متزوج يحب عمله وقد لقي دعم 
كبير من محيطه العملي حيث ان زبائنه هم اكثرية اهل قريته يريد وقد اثر بشكل ايجابي عليه قرضه الاول من المجموعة
في زيادة مدخوله ما يميزه هي المصداقية في التعامل والصدق في العمل يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة الى
شراء شبكات جديدة للمولد وشراء مولد جديد
texts.en: Rifaat, who is 38 years old and married, has four years of experience working in the distribution of generator-powered electricity. He very much enjoys his work and is distinguished by his credibility and integrity. Rifaat also receives considerable support from his customers, most of whom hail from his home village. The last loan from Al Majmoua had a very positive impact in enabling Rifaat to achieve higher revenues. Accordingly, he would now like to seek another loan to purchase a new generator and new grids.

loans.use: To purchase new electric generator and new electric grids

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: Achat des haricots, manioc

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.ar:
محمد في عمر 37 سنة متزوج وله ولد يعمل في بيع الالبسة الجاهزة له في عمله 5 سنوات يحب عمله يبتكر فيه
اكثر ما يميزه هو ملاحقة الموديلات الجديدة والصدق والامانة في التعامل له تاريخ جيد مع المجموعة حيث ساهم القرض 
الاول في زيادة البضائع في المحل وزيادة المدخول يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة الى شراء ثياب بالجملة لبيعها
وتوسيع المحل وبذلك يزيد مدخوله ويستطيع ان يخفف من وطأة المنافسة عليه حيث ان زبائنه تطالبه بزيادة البضائع
texts.en: Mohamad is a 37-year-old husband and father who, for the past five years, has been selling ready-made clothes. Mohamad is very honest, trustworthy, and innovative in his work and is always following up on the latest trends. Given his good credit history with Al Majmoua, he now wanted to ask for another loan to expand his shop and purchase clothes wholesale. This would help Mohamad counter the competition and meet the rising demand of his customers.

loans.use: To purchase clothes wholesale

loans.name: Nadya

texts.ar:
ناديا في عمر 31 سنة عزباء تعمل في محل لبيع الالعاب والهدايا والاكسسوار لها في عملها 4 سنوات تحب عملها
وتطمح في تطوير نفسها وعمله حيث انها طموحة ومجتهدة في طلب الرزق والتحسين من وضعها الاجتماعي والمادي
لديها تاريخ جيد حيث اثر بشكل كبير القرض السابق وهي تريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء بضائع
جديدة لتطوير المهنة  وزيادة المدخول فهي تسعى جاهدة لعدم احتياج احد في مدخولها لا توجد لديها صعوبة لتطور
غير الصعوبات المادية فهي محبوبة في محيطها العملي وزبائنها هم من جيرانها ومحيطها
texts.en: Nadya, who is 31 years old and single, has been working for the past four years in a gift shop. She is very keen to further develop herself and her business. Nadya is very driven to secure her livelihood and advance her sociA. standing so that she need not rely on anyone else. She is very popular among her customers, who come from her neighborhood and generA. community. Her last loan from A. Majmoua had a very positive effect. Now, Nadya wants to ask for another loan to purchase more inventory for the shop.

loans.use: To purchase inventory for gift shop

loans.name: Eliana

texts.es:
Eliana forma parte del banco comunal “Ríos de Valdivia”, perteneciente a la ciudad de Valdivia. Su negocio es la producción y venta de empanadas, tortas, galletas, kuchenes y sopaipillas, en una tienda de rotisería y amasandería,  ubicada en un amplio sector de Valdivia, desde hace varios años. Hace un tiempo cuenta con un ayudante panadero, quien está a su cargo. 
Con este préstamo comprará una máquina laminadora de cecinas.
 Su sueño es lograr trabajar solo supervisando el su local, ya que hasta ahora trabaja mucho en la mantención de su negocio. 
Gracias a Fondo Esperanza, Eliana ha obtenido varias máquinas necesarias para la elaboración de sus productos, entre ellos hornos, batidoras, etc.
Valdivia es una ciudad del sur de Chile, ubicada en la región de Los Ríos. Se destaca por tener uno de los pocos ríos navegables de Chile, el Calle Calle. Valdivia presenta, dentro de sus principales actividades económicas, la industria de la construcción naval, maderera, papelera, celulosa (Celco), cervecera y molinera. El turismo desempeña un papel importante, como también los servicios educacionales universitarios, encabezados por la Universidad Austral de Chile.
texts.en:
Eliana is a member of the "Ríos de Valdivia" community bank, in the city of Valdivia.  Her business is making and selling empanadas, cakes, cookies and fried pastries in a delicatessen and bakery store located in a sector of Valdivia.   She has been in this business for several years.  She has employed an assistant baker for some time.

With this loan, Eliana will buy a machine for packaging cured meats.  Eliana's dream is to manage to supervise her premises alone since up to now she has worked a lot on maintaining her business.  Thanks to Fondo Esperanza, Eliana has obtained several machines that she needs to make her products such as ovens, mixers, etc.

Valdivia is a city in the south of Chile which is located in Los Ríos region.  It is noted for having one of the few navigable rivers in Chile, the Calle Calle.  Some of Valvidia's principal businesses are the shipbuilding industry, the lumber industry, the paper industry, the wood pulp industry (Celco), the beer industry and the milling industry.  Tourism plays an important role as does the university business, headed by the Universidad Austral de Chile.

loans.use: To buy a machine for packaging cured meats

loans.name: Wissam

texts.ar:
وسام في عمر 39 سنة متزوج وله 6 اولاد يعمل في بيع وتصليح الالكترونيات له في عمله 20 سنة يحب عمله ويطور
فيه دائما فهو محب للتجدد والتطور ما يميزه هو الدقة والصدق في العمل يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة
الى شراء مسجلات مستعملة وتلفزيونات لإعادة بيعها زبائنه هم من محيطه وجيرانه يحب عائلته ويسعى جاهدا الى تأمين لقمة العيش
لهم فهم كل اهتمامه له خبرة واسعة في عمله
texts.en: Wissam is a 39-year-old husband and father of six who loves his family very much and always works hard to secure their daily bread. His 20 years of experience selling and repairing electronic devices has been marked by dynamism and thoroughness. Wissam’s customers are comprised of his neighbors and fellow community members. He is now seeking a loan from Al Majmoua to purchase used televisions and tape recorders for resale.

loans.use: To purchase used televisions and tape recorders for resale

loans.name: Duteraninkinga Group

texts.fr: Francine M. est commerçante, est elle est un membre du groupe Duteraninkunga Rugando.  Elle est née à Ruhuha, Rwanda, elle a 38 ans, mariée, et elle a 1 enfant de 2 ans.  Elle a fini 6 ans d’école primaire, et elle est client d’ACB depuis 2010.  Elle va utiliser son prêt pour l’achat de manioc, et des chèvres.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est d’améliorer ses activités actuelles de commerce de manioc et des chèvres.  Elle voudrait être grossiste, est payer les frais scolaires pour ses enfants.
texts.en: Francine M., an enterpeneur, is a member of the Duteraninkunga Rugando group. She was born in Ruhuha, Rwanda. She is 38 years old, married, and has a 2-year old child. She finished six classes of elementary school. She has been a client of ACB since 2010. She will use her loan to purchase manioc (cassava) and goats. Her business strategy is to increase her sales of manioc and goats. She would like to become a wholesaler and be able to pay school fees for her [child].

loans.use: Purchasing manioc, goats

loans.name: Ikram

texts.ar:
اكرام في عمر 44 سنة تعمل في محل لبيع الاحذية لها في عملها من اكثر من 3 سنوات فهي غير متزوجة ولكنها تسعى دائما
الى تطوير العائلة ونفسها فهي تعيل والدتها هي طموحة ونشيطة تحب العمل الدائم وتريد ان تطور نفسها وعملها
لها مع المجموعة تاريخ جيد وقد اثر القرض بشكل ايجابي على عملها وهي تريد طلب قرض من المجموعة بهدف شراء بضائع
جديدة من ثياب واحذية وغيره وزيداة المدخول حتى يزيد الربح لها زبائن كثر من محيطها وجيرانها وضيعتها
فهي مقصودة من نساء ضيعتها ومحبوبة
texts.en: Ikram is 44 years old. Although she isn’t married, she does support her mother and help out with her family. Ikram has been selling shoes for more than 3 years. She is very assiduous and driven and is always looking to develop herself and her work. She is very popular with the many women from her village who provide their patronage. Given her good standing with A. Majmoua, Ikram wanted to apply for another loan to purchase more inventory (clothing, shoes, etc.) to increase the revenues of her business.

loans.use: To purchase clothing, shoes, and other inventory

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.ar:
ابراهيم في عمر 47 سنة يعمل في تعهدات وورش البناء له في عمله 27 سنة يحب عمله ويبرع فيه فهو نشيط وطموح
متزوج وله اربع اولاد يحب عائلته ويسعى ائما الى تأمين العيش الكريم لهم وتعليهم في مستوى جيد يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من
المجموعة الى شراء مواد اولية للورش وتوسيع العمل له مميزات في عمله فهو دقيق صادق ونشيط يحب دائما ان
يزيد من مدخوله المادي وتحسين وضعه لاجتماعي
texts.en: Ibrahim is a 47-year-old husband and father of four who loves his family very much and wants to provide them with a decent education and standard of living. Ibrahim has 27 years of experience working in contracting and workshops. He is very distinguished in his work, which he invests with great vigor, passion, and thoroughness. Ibrahim is now seeking a loan from Al Majmoua to purchase raw materials for his shop and expand his business.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials for workshop

loans.name: Malik

texts.en: Malik is a 42 years old married man, father of 5 children. Malik manufactures car exhausts since 1999 with 21 years of experience. Malik is requesting  a loan from Al Majmoua, in order to buy the necessary products to his business. His work is unique in the region, and is requested by most car mechanics. Malik is well known with his good quality of work, he's also known with his accurate timing and client service. Malik is working hard to provide his family secure living and health. He hopes to expand and improve his business as much as he can, and keep a good base for his family.

loans.use: To Buy necessary products to his business

loans.name: Cyborg Group

texts.en:
Meet with members of the “Cyborg” group from Magburaka, a town in northern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org to apply for a loan of SLL 800,000 for each. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. 

Adamsay is the leader of this group. The thirty-five-year-old is married to a farmer and they have three children. Adamsay has been a businesswoman for many years now, she sells shoes. With her share of this loan, she will buy bales of shoes to add to her business. 

(Also included in the right of the photo is loan officer Mohamed L. Tarawalie handing over the loan to the clients)

loans.use: Buys bales of shoes to add to her business

loans.name: Kamuyu United Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the “Kamuyu United” group from Magburaka, a town in northern Sierra Leone. They are petty-businesspeople who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org in order to seek for a loan of SLL 400,000 for each in the group. With this loan, they will be able to add more goods to their businesses, attract more customers, make more sales and profit and consequently improve on their living conditions. 

The leader of this group of entrepreneurs is Abubakarr K.. Abubakarr was born in Magburaka, thirty-five years ago. He is married and has three children – two in secondary school and one in primary school. Abubakarr is a welder and has been in the welding profession for many years. With his share of this loan, he will buy welding materials such as iron robs, fuel, etc. to improve his business. 

(Also included in the right of the photo is loan officer Mohamed L. Tarawalie handing over the loan to the clients)

loans.use: Buys welding materials such as iron robs, fuel, etc to improve his business

loans.name: Tuzamurane Shyara Group

texts.fr: Marie Claudine M. est commerçante, et elle est un membre du groupe Tuzamurane Shyara.  Elle est née à Ruhuha, Rwanda, elle a 36 ans, mariée, et elle a 4 enfants entre 2 ans et 15 ans.  Elle a fini deux ans d’école secondaire, et 2 de ses enfants vont a l’école.  Elle est client d’ACB depuis 2010, et elle va utiliser son prêt pour l’achat des haricots, sorghos, riz, et arachide.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est d’améliorer ses activités actuelle de commerce.  Elle voulait construire une maison, et payer les frais scolaires pour ses enfants.
texts.en: Marie Claudine M., an entrepreneur, is a member of the Tuzamurane Shyara group. She was born in Ruhuha, Rwanda. She is 36 years old, married, and has four children from 2 to 15 years of age. She finished two classes of secondary school, and two of her children go to school. She has been a client of ACB since 2010. She will use her loan to purchase beans, sorghum, rice, and peanuts. Her business strategy is to improve her sales. She would like to build a house and pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: Purchasing  beans, sorghum, rice, and peanuts

loans.name: Taturmor Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone is very please to present to you members of the “Taturmor” group. These are small scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek for a loan of SLL 500,000.00 for each in order to invest in their businesses. 

Memuna T. is the leader of this group. Memuna is thirty-eight-year-old, married with five children – two in primary school and three in secondary school. Memuna sells ready-to-wear-clothes and has been doing this business for ten years now. With the help of this loan, Memuna will invest in her business by buying ready-to-wear-clothes and shoes to add to her business.  

(Also included in the right of the photo is loan officer Mohamed L. Tarawalie handing over the loan to the clients)

loans.use: Buys ready-to-wear-clothes and shoes to add to her business.

loans.name: Jumapili

texts.en:
Jumapili K. K. is a 28 year old man. He is married to Christine and together they have been blessed with two children. Jumapili has been in the green grocery business for the last eight years and this business has been able to cater for his family needs.

This marks his second loan from KADET LTD and he plans to purchase vegetables, cereals and paraffin which he will later resell at a profit. He anticipates some profits after this initial investment and he hopes to direct the profits to the expansion of his business and repayment of the loan he has applied for.

He hopes to own a paraffin pump and become a full supplier in the town.

loans.use: purchase vegetables, cereals and paraffin (kerosene lamp)

loans.name: Dufanyebahinzi No 2 Group

texts.fr:
Alexis N. est commerçante, et elle est un membre du groupe Dufanyebahinzi no 2.  Elle est née à Ruhuha, Rwanda, elle a 28 ans, mariée, et elle a 1 enfant de 4 ans.  Elle a fini 5 ans d’école primaire, est elle est client d’ACB depuis 2010.  Elle va utiliser son prêt pour l’achat des haricots, manioc, riz, et harachide.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est d’améliorer ses activités pour vendre ses articles dans les différents marchés.  Elle voudrait devenir grossiste, et pour sa famille, elle voudrait payer des frais scolaires et médicaux pour ses enfants.
*Thacienne N. était malade quand nous avons pris cette photo, alors son mari a pris son place dans la photo.
texts.en:
Alexis N., an entrepreneur, is a member of the Dufanyebahinzi No.2 group. She was born in Ruhuha, Rwanda. She is 28 years old, married, and has a 4-year old child. She has finished five classes of primary school. She has been a client of ACB sine 2010. She will use her loan to purchase beans, manioc (cassava), rice, and peanuts. Her business strategy is to increase her sales by offering her produce at different markets. She would like to become a wholesaler; as to her family, she would like to pay her [child’s] school fees and healthcare expenses.

*As Thacienne N. was ill at the time this photo was taken, her husband has replaced her in the photo.

loans.use: Purchasing beans, manioc, rice, peanuts

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a 25 year old single young man who is very ambitious and hardworking. He lives in a place called Waithaka, which is on the outskirts of Nairobi town. Most of the residents here are farmers both crop and animal farmers. Paul is practicing animal farming by rearing Dairy cattle and selling the milk to the locals. 

This will be Paul’s first loan with KADET LTD and he intends to use it to venture in poultry farming in addition to the dairy farming that he is currently in.

In future, Paul hopes to own a big farm and be able to supply farm products in Waithaka and Kikuyu town.

loans.use: Paul plans to start poultry farming

loans.name: Ramzana's Group

texts.en:
Ramzana is 38-years old housewife, spends most of her time staying at home and doing her household responsibilities. She is a mother of five children. Her elder son is a laborer by profession and the other two from remaining four is getting education from a local school. 

She is married to M. A. who is involved in timber selling business. He runs a shop where he sells timbers to his customers and makes regular income. 

Ramzana has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. Her husband has a larger order to fulfill. With the loan, he will buy timbers in bulk and fulfills the order to make greater profits. 

Ramzana is hopeful that an investment will be helpful for her husband and will make his work easy.  

She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 4th loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.

Note: "In the photo, the lady with a book (called Asasah passbook) is Ramzana.

loans.use: To buy timbers for selling

loans.name: Paul Wafula

texts.en:
Paul Wafula O. is a 32 year old man. He is married to Mary and together they have been blessed with one child. His wife is a business lady who runs a retail shop which is commonly known as a kiosk. Paul owns a welding workshop and he has been in this business for the last one year. 

This will be his second loan from KADET LTD and he plans to purchase more welding equipments into his business. The anticipated profits will be directed into the expansion of his business.
 
His dream is to own more welding workshops.

loans.use: purchase more welding equipments into his business

loans.name: Nusrat's Group

texts.en:
Nusrat belongs to a small city called Arifwala. It is located in Pakistan and known for its agriculture industry. She has been living there in a two room brick house for past 18 years. 

Nusrat is 36 years old, married to G. R.. She has five sons and one daughter. She could only manage to give education to 2 children. 
Nusrat has a buffalo at her home which produces good quality milk for her to sell. She sells milk to her community and makes reasonable income every month. Her income helps her paying utility bills and fee for her children’s education. 

Her husband takes land on contract and grows different crops and vegetables on it. He is doing this business for over many years. 
Nusrat has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy seeds and fertilizer to get maximum output from the land. She is hopeful that an investment will be a productive one for her husband and will help him making greater profits. 

She is a new loan user of Asasah and this is her 1st loan application. She is hopeful that it will be a profitable experience for her family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer & seeds for agriculture business

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes M. M. is 30 years old business lady. She is married and has been a retail trader dealing in the sale of cereals and grocery for the last four years in Voi town. 

Agnes has been a KADET member and this marks her third loan from KADET, and she plans to purchase more stock of cereals, onions and flour. Agnes will direct the anticipated profits into the expansion of her grocery business. Her main customers are the residents of Voi. 

Her dream for the future is to own a big grocery store in Voi.

loans.use: purchase cereals, onions and flour

loans.name: Joule Henry

texts.es:
Joule tiene 22 años es soltero vive en casa de sus padres en Fonavi La Angostura se inicio de forma dependiente en el rubro de la construcción hace muchos años,en la actualidad labora de forma independiente y cuenta con personal fijo a su cargo.
Joule es propietario de una moto lineal la cual fue adquirida con sus ahorros y la utiliza como herramienta de trabajo para poder movilizarse, el financiamiento otorgado sera destinado para la reparación y mantenimiento de su moto lineal.
texts.en: Joule is 22 years old.  He is single and lives in his parents' home in Fonavi La Angostura.  He started working as an employee in the construction industry many years ago.  He now works independently and has permanent staff working for him.  Joule owns a motorbike that he bought with his savings.  He uses it as a work tool, to get around.  He will use his loan to have his motorbike repaired and serviced.

loans.use: To fix his motorbike

loans.name: Dufanyebahinzi No1 Group

texts.fr: Janvier N. est commerçant, et membre du groupe Dufanyebahinzi no 1.  Il est ne a Gikongoro, Rwanda, il a 38 ans, marié, et il a 1 enfants de 14 ans.  Il a fini 3 ans d’école primaire, et son enfant va a l’école.  Il est client d’ACB depuis 2010, et il va utiliser son prêt pour l’achat des haricots, sorghos, mais, manioc, et riz.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est d’avoir un stock ou dépôt stock pour vendre ses articles dans les différents secteurs de Ruhuha.  Il voudrait devenir grossiste, payer des frais scolaire pour ses enfants, et aussi acheter une maison d’habitation.
texts.en: Janvier N. is a businessman and a member of the Dufanyebahinzi no.1 group. He was born in Gikongoro, Rwanda, is 38 years old, married and has one child who is 14 years old. He completed three years at primary school, and his child goes to school. He has been a customer of ACB since 2010 and is going to use his loan to buy beans, sorghum, corn, cassava and rice. His plan of action to expand his business is to have a stock or a depot to be able to sell his products in different areas of Ruhuha. He would like to become a  wholesaler, pay his child's school fees and also buy a house to live in.

loans.use: Purchase of beans, sorghum, corn, cassava and rice

loans.name: Abbas

texts.ar:
عباس في عمر 25 سنة يعمل في محل لبيع الاجهزة الخليوية يحب عمله له فيه اكثر من 5 سنوات يريد ان يتطور وان يزيد من
مدخوله الشهري فهو طموح وجدي في التعامل ما يميز عمله هو النشاط والتجدد في البضائع
له تاريخ جيد في المجموعة يريد من خلال طلب قرض من المجموعة الى شراء اكسسوار للاجهزة الخليوية ما يحلم به هو ان يصبح
من اصحاب المحلات الكبيرة له زبائن من محيطه ومحبيه
texts.en: Abbas (25 years old) has been employed for the past five years in a cellular phone shop. He is very earnest, diligent, and dynamic, as well as very eager to find ways to increase his salary. His customers hail from his circle of friends and his community. Given his good standing with Al Majmoua, Abbas wanted to seek another loan to purchase cell phone accessories. He ultimately hopes to own a large chain of such stores.

loans.use: To purchase cell phone accessories

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the improvement of her husband’s tea stall business. Her husband’s tea stall is located in the market from where he offers his clients different flavors of tea such as green, creamy, and milky and black.  
His tea is very famous among his customers. He is doing this business for over 10 years and very well known in the region for his good quality services. With the loan, he will buy green tea, black tea, sugar and milk. 
Razia herself is a housewife, spends most of her time in doing her household responsibilities. She has four sons who are all very young and stays at home. Razia couldn’t provide them education facilities due to poor financial conditions. 
Now she is hopeful that after the loan investment, her husbands’ business will get improved and she will be able to send her youngest son to school. 
She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 3rd loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit record by paying her installments on time and by attending all the recovery meetings. 
She belongs to Arifwala which is a small city of Punjab Pakistan and known for its dairy industry. 
Note: "In the photo, the lady with a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Razia.

loans.use: To buy green tea, black tea, sugar and milk for tea stall business

loans.name: Bugembe Katwe Women's Group-Jinja

texts.en: 43 year old N. Getrude is a happily married mother of 4 who operates a tailoring business in Bugembe-Jinja. This business has been in existence for close to 13 years. Getrude says she learned tailoring from her late grand mum. Before she established this business she was more into selling agro produce. She still sells cash crops such as maize, beans and rice but on a more smaller scale now. Getrude who pleads a cause with Bugembe Katwe group says weekly this business generates shillings 100,000. With this loan, Getrude says she is going to buy more clothing making textile fabric. Two members in the group photo were obscured so we marked them as unpictured.

loans.use: The purchase of more cloth making textile fabric

loans.name: Orlando Felipe

texts.es:
Orlando es un padre de familia, muy trabajador para apoyar a su familia. Hoy en día trabaja como guarda de seguridad en donde ha estado fijo por tres años.
Las mejoras a su casa la ha venido logrando mediante financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado en siete ciclos en donde ha avanzado grandemente toda su casa, construyéndola de pared, aun falta poco para poder cerrarla toda por completo de bloques.
Con este nuevo crédito comprara: laminas de zinc, arena, cemento para embaldosar su sala. Lo que está contento por lograr cada día, una vivienda digna para su familia.
texts.en:
Orlando is a father who works very hard to support his family.  He currently works as a security guard and has had a permanent position for three years.

Orlando has made improvements to his home through loans from Afodenic.  He has been through seven loan cycles and has greatly improved his whole house, building his walls from blocks.  He doesn't have much left to do for it to be completed and entirely built from blocks.

Orlando will use this new loan to buy: sheets of corrugated metal, sand, and cement for tiling his living room.  Orlando is happy that he is able to achieve a decent home for his family.

loans.use: To buy building supplies such as: sand, cement, gravel, sheets of corrugated metal, etc.  To tile his living room and to build his roof.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, D. 57 años, vive  en su casa propia  al lado D.  su esposo  Jesús (58), y dos D. sus cuatro hijos; pues juntos buscan salir adelante y alcanzar el progreso.DesD. hace varios años atrás está emprendedora mujer se dedica a la venta D. jugos y extractos, D. manera ambulatoria. Su negocio ha crecido bastante y  con esas ganancias más el sueldo D. su esposo logró mandar  construir su casa, D. material noble,  en la que hoy se desarrolla con éxito su negocio. Por esta razón, a diario se provee D. frutas frescas en cantidades considerables, con las que realiza los deliciosos jugos y extractos,  así mismo venD. queques y gaseosas en su negocio con lo que obtiene regulares ganancias. María se siente muy contenta, ya que el negocio que realiza le gusta mucho, además cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo en la atención. Además paralelamente a esta labor también se dedica a la venta D.  lencería por catálogos, mientras sus clientes le consumen los jugos aprovecha D. mostrar las revistas  y va captando clientes. Para más adelante piensa ampliar su negocio e instalar una fuente D. soda, D. esta manera espera seguir adelante.Es el 16avo préstamo que tiene con MFP, y se siente agradecida por el apoyo recibido, por lo que  promete pagar   sus cuotas en las fechas señaladas.María tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la adquisición D. helados, D. marcas garantizadas, ya que la fábrica le prestaría la congeladora, y espera  aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
María is 57 years old.  She lives in her own home with her husband Jesús (58) and two of her four children.  Together they work to get ahead in life and  make progress.

For several years, this enterprising woman has been selling juices and extracts as an itinerant street vendor.  Her business has grown quite a lot and with the profits she has maD., together with her husband's wage, she has been able to build her home from solid construction materials.  She now runs her business successfully from her home.  Every day she stocks up with considerable quantities of fresh fruit which she uses to make her delicious juices and extracts.  She also sells cakes and soda in her business and makes regular income from this.

María feels very happy since she really enjoys her business and she has her husband's support.  In parallel with this business, María also sells underwear through catalogs.  While her customers are drinking their juices, she takes advantage to show them her catalogs and thereby attract new customers.  In the future, she is thinking of expanding her business and setting up a soda fountain.  In this way, she hopes to get ahead.

This is María's 16th loan with MFP and she is grateful for the support she has received.  For this reason, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  María plans to invest her loan money in buying guaranteed brands of frozen treats since the factory will lend her a freezer.  In this way, she hopes to increase her profits.

loans.use: To buy frozen treats to stock her business

loans.name: Kalsoom's Group

texts.en:
Kalsoom belongs to Arifwala which is a small city of Punjab Pakistan and known for its dairy industry.  She has been living there with her family in a three room brick house for the last 15 years. 
She herself is a seam-stress, stitches clothes for her neighboring clients. Due to her quality of work, she receives good number of orders every month. 
Her husband’s name is A. D. and he works in a vegetable market as a vegetable seller. 
Kalsoom is the mother of two sons, both are young and have not started getting education yet. 
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband. With the loan, he will buy fresh seasonal vegetable for selling. He has more than 10 years of experience in his business and Kalsoom is hopeful that an investment will be more profitable for him. 
She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 2nd loan application. In previous loan year, she has established a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.

loans.use: To buy fresh seasonal vegetables for vegetable selling business

loans.name: Mercedes Consuelo

texts.es:
Mercedes de 31 años, escogió la actividad de comerciante porque la mama le enseño como administrar un negocio ya que ella tenía un bazar para mantener el hogar. 

Poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicaciones mercedes ha trabajado para surtir su pequeño negocio con cuadernos, pañales, cuadernos etc. Por el momento su mama le ayuda en el negocio para que ella tenga tiempo para sus estudios. 

Sus planes para el futuro es seguir trabajando en su negocio y con el préstamo comprar pañales, cuadernos, zapatos para tener más surtido el negocio y que sus clientes tengan más variedad al comprar. En el futuro quiere tener su casa de un segundo piso.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 31 years old.  She chose to become a saleswoman because her mom taught her how to run a business as she had a small store through which she supported their household.

Little by little, with effort and commitment, Mercedes has worked to stock her small business with exercise books, diapers, etc.  At the moment, her mom helps her in her business so that she has time for her studies.  Her future plans are to continue working in her business and to use her loan to buy diapers, exercise books and shoes to better stock her store so that her customers have more variety when they come to buy from her.  In the future, she would like to add a second level to her home.

loans.use: To buy diapers and exercise books

loans.name: Janina Karina

texts.es:
Janina de 32 años, empezó como una microempresaria hace varios años atrás para poder tener un horario cómodo ya que es madre soltera. También así poder atender a sus tres hijos que ahora tienen 15, 10 y 8 años. 

Con esfuerzo y dedicación ha podido mantener a sus hijos con las necesidades que han tenido. En la actualidad ella trabaja desde muy temprano vendiendo ropa, perfumes, cosméticos para con una variedad de mercadería que comprar y revende. Una de las dificultades que en ocasiones se le presenta es que necesita atender a sus hijos adecuadamente pero no puede porque está trabajando vendiendo la mercadería. 

Quiere continuar con su negocio por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar cosméticos, perfumes, ropa y otra parte del dinero hacer adecuaciones para el local con cemento, pintura. En el futuro quiere tener un bazar y así mejorar sus ingresos para darle una mejor vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Janina is 32 years old.  She started out as a small businesswoman several years ago so that she could work comfortable hours as she is a single mother.  She also wanted to be able to look after her three children who are now 15, 10 and 8.

Through hard work and commitment, Janina has managed to support her children and cover their needs.  She currently works from very early in the morning selling clothes, perfumes and cosmetics and a variety of merchandise that she buys and re-sells.  One of the difficulties that she sometimes has is that she needs to look after her children properly but can't because she is working, selling her merchandise.

Janina would like to continue in her business and, for this reason, she is requesting a loan to buy cosmetics, perfumes and clothes.  She will also use some of the money to do some work on her premises, buying cement and paint.  In the future, she would like to own a general store and thereby improve her income so that she can provide her children with a better life.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics, clothes and cement

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Francisco vive en casa de su hermano en alquiler, en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz.
Francisco tiene un micro con el cual trabaja en transporte libre de pasajeros; de esta manera genera sus ingresos para subsistir y mantener a su familia.
El crédito que solicita es para comprar su motor y mantener estable su herramienta de trabajo.

Es cliente de Impro desde el año 2009 y paga muy bien.  Por el carácter social, califica para obtener un crédito. Esta es la segunda vez que solicita un crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Francisco lives in his brother’s rented house.  He lives in the Tembladerani zone in the city of La Paz.

Francisco has a minibus, which he uses for passenger transportation.  This is how he generates income to survive and support his family.

He will use the loan that he is requesting to buy a motor and keep his work tool in stable condition.

He has been a client of Impro since 2009, and he pays very well.  His character and reputation qualify him to obtain a loan.  This is the second time he has requested a loan from Kiva.

loans.use: To buy a motor for his vehicle that he uses for passenger transpotation

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the finishing touches for the newly built house and to purchase furniture

loans.name: Willian Tony

texts.es:
Willian de 46 años, escogió tener una tienda porque cuando se fue a vivir al sector del suburbio vio que era necesario para la gente tener un lugar donde comprar víveres de primera necesidad. 

Poco a poco ha comprado víveres para su pequeña tienda que la tiene ubicada en la parte delantera de su casa. En la actualidad atiende la tienda con ayuda de su esposa desde la mañana hasta las 23h00pm. Venden todo tipo de víveres como lácteos, arroz, legumbres, vegetales etc. Ellos tienen tres hijos de 22, 14 y 10 años de edad que todavía estudian. 

Para seguir con su tienda surtida él quiere comprar con el préstamo víveres como arroz, lácteos, legumbre, vegetales ya que quiere darle una buena vida a su familia.
texts.en:
William is 46 years old.  He chose to have a store because when he went to live in El Suburbio, he saw the need that the people had for a place to buy basic needs items.  Little by little, he was buying provisions for his small store.  The store is in the front part of his house.  

He currently tends to the store, with his wife’s help, from the morning until 11:00 p.m.  They sell all types of foods like dairy products, rice, and vegetables, etc.  They have three children, ages 22, 14, and 10.  They are still in school.

In order to continue with a stocked store, he wants to use the loan to buy provisions like rice, dairy products, and vegetables.

loans.use: Dairy products and vegetables

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La señora Teresa vive en alquiler en la zona de Villa Nuevo Potosí de la ciudad de La Paz, esta soltera y tiene una hija a la cual mantiene; la actividad que realiza es la venta de abarrotes en una tienda que le dejó su señora madre. Con los ingresos de la tienda ella mantiene a su hija y cubre todas sus necesidades.

El crédito será utilizado en la compra de Aceite, huevos, arroz y harina, para surtir su tienda y vender a sus clientes.

Es cliente de Impro y paga muy bien por el carácter social califica para obtener un crédito.
texts.en:
Teresa rents where she lives in the Villa Nuevo Potosí zone in the city of La Paz.  She is single, and she has a daughter whom she supports. 

Teresa sells groceries in a store that her mother left her.  She supports her daughter and covers all of their necessities with the income from the store.

She will use the loan to buy oil, eggs, rice, and flour to stock her store and sell to her customers.

She is a client of Impro, and she pays very well.  Her character and reputation qualify her for a loan.

loans.use: To buy merchandise (oil, eggs, rice, and flour) for her grocery store

loans.name: Balimaya Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe BALIMAYA  est constitué de six femmes (5 mariées et 1 célibataire) ayant en moyenne 32  ans, 4 enfants et vivant la plupart dans des  familles monogames à HAMDALLAYE, un des quartiers de la ville de Sikasso (3ème région administrative du Mali). 
Elles sont à leur première collaboration avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. Ce groupe de femmes fait l’achat vente de pagnes, de condiments alimentaires et de la restauration à l’image de NAHAWA S.. 
NAHAWA S.  compte acheter avec son  prêt, 150 Kg de riz et des condiments pour des fins de restauration. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de SIKASSO auprès des grossistes. La restauration est faite au marché de HAMDALLAYE à Sikasso et les mets alimentaires divers et variés sont vendus à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes, au comptant et à crédit. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40.000FCFA  qui sera utilisé  essentiellement pour les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en:
The Balimaya group is made up of six women (five married and one single woman) who average 32 years of age with four children; most of them live in monogamous families in Hamdallaye, one of the neighborhoods of the town of Sikasso (Mali's third administrative region). They are on their first loan from the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, in order to be able to satisfy their customers' needs. This group of women buy and sell "pagnes" (pieces of colourful West African fabric), condiments, and are also active in the restauration trade as is the case for Nahawa S..

With her loan, Nahawa S. is planning to buy 150kg of rice and condiments for restauration purposes. She gets her supplies from wholesalers at the large market in Sikasso. She carries out her restauration activity at the Hamdallaye market in Sikasso, and the various dishes are sold to a customer base made up of men and women, for cash and on credit. She is expecting to make an average monthly profit of 40.000FCFA which will be used principally to cover the family's daily expenses.

loans.use: To buy rice and condiments

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose  solicito 400 $us, se dedica  al transporte de pasajeros a nivel ciudad como chofer asalariado. Jose vive en la zona de Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz. Está casado.
El crédito lo destinara en la adquisición de repuestos para su movilidad para su mejor desempeño en su trabajo. Es  el segundo crédito en impro y el primero vía Kiva.
texts.en: Jose is requesting a loan for $400 USD.  He provides passenger transport services in his city as a salaried driver.  He is married and lives in the Achachicala district of the city of La Paz.  He will use his loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle so that he can better carry out his work.  This is José's second loan with Impro and his first loan through Kiva.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for his passenger transport vehicle
